pitch.title: FIND A CAUSE AND PLEDGE YOUR SKILLS
pitch.description: Nonprofits, NGOs, and charities have to spend money on IT development. That money could be used on their actual missions but they need the IT. #Charity is a new platform that connects the tech needs of organizations to individuals or teams of IT experts willing to volunteer their tech skills and time.

thing1.title: #GOODCAUSE
thing1.description: Details about the Main thing 1 here - in one or two sentences.

thing2.title: #SKILLBASED
thing2.description: Details about the Main thing 2 here - in one or two sentences.

thing3.title: #EXECUTION
thing3.description: Details about the Main thing 3 here - in one or two sentences.

counter.title: Are you someone who cares?
counter.text: 1,231,233 professionals already care about others. Are you the next?

step1.title: #OPEN
step1.description: It all starts with a great charity idea. Put here what kind of ideas we talk about and how easy to create it on our site. Emphasize that they should describe the skills they need - but could start without it as well, we will help.

step2.title: #MATCH
step2.description: We match the projects wth contributors with the proper skills. Describe here why it is more efficient than anything else. Why is it good for project owner and why it is good for contributors.

step3.title: #TOGETHER
step3.description: Put here that we will support the execution too. Describe why it is important and that we ensure Collboration, Reposiotry management, Storage and Social network tools.

smartmatch.title: #SMARTMATCH
smartmatch.description: Put the 30 seconds pitch here. It should be very easy to understand and not too long. Put the 30 seconds pitch here. It should be very easy to understand and not too long.
